HTML Paths Test Widget

This widget tests various HTML attributes that reference external files.

1. Link href (External CSS)

If this text is green and bold, external CSS loaded.

<link rel="stylesheet" href="./assets/styles.css">

2. Script src (External JS)

Waiting for external JS...

<script src="./assets/script.js">

3. Img src


<img src="./assets/logo.svg">

4. Img srcset


<img srcset="./assets/logo.svg 1x, ./assets/logo.svg 2x">

5. Picture / Source


<source srcset="./assets/logo.svg">

6. SVG use href


<use href="./assets/icon.svg#icon">

Note: SVG use with external file has limited browser support

7. Object data


<object data="./assets/icon.svg">

8. Embed src


<embed src="./assets/icon.svg">

9. Iframe src


<iframe src="./assets/nested.html">

10. Link preload

Preload link added (check Network tab)

<link rel="preload" href="./assets/module.js" as="script">

11. Anchor href (relative page)

Open nested.html
<a href="./assets/nested.html">
